programme.title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
programme.desc: Milkha Singh, the Flying Sikh, overcomes many agonising obstacles to become a world champion, Olympian and one of India's most iconic athletes. Milkha Singh, who was scarred by the brutal partition of British India, joins the Indian military and is subsequently motivated to represent India at the Olympics. programme.title: Pyaar To Hona Hi Tha
programme.desc: Sanjana is in love with Rahul and wants to marry him. When Rahul leaves Sanjana for a woman he meets in India, Sanjana refuses to give up. She decides to fly to India to win back Rahul's heart. On her way, she comes up with a plan to win Rahul's heart and asks Shekhar to act as her boyfriend. But, Shekhar has another plan. He has hidden a diamond in Sanjan's purse. He agrees to stay with her as he wants his diamond back. Amidst the drama, Sanjana begins to fall in love with Shekhar. (Film - Romance)

programme.title: Bhoothnath Returns
programme.desc: Sequel to the 2008 movie, this supernatural-comedy movie is based on Kailash Nath (Amitabh Bachchan) aka Bhoothnath. Bhoothnath returns to Earth in order to redeem himself after he is mocked by his fellow ghost friends over his abilities to scare children. Unfortunately, Bhoothnath fails in scaring Akhrot, a young boy. Akhrot then cracks a deal with him under which he helps Bhoothnath in scaring kids, while in return Bhoothnath has to pretend to be scared of Akhrot. Soon, the duo starts helping the ghosts trapped in under-construction sites by fulfilling their last wishes and helping their families. After discovering the level of corruption in India, Akhrot and Bhoothnath contest the elections against an influential but corrupt politician Bhau. The two are threatened by Bhau and his men, which leads to one of them struggling for survival. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: In the third instalment of the 'Johnny English' series, English, a retired M17 agent, currently working as a geography teacher, is entrusted with a secret mission. He teams up with his old aide Bough to investigate a cyber-attack that revealed the identity of Britain's intelligence agents. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Childhood friends Rafe and Danny become army pilots and meet Evelyn, a navy nurse. However, the three of them later find themselves in the middle of the attack on Pearl Harbour during World War II. (Film - War)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two naughty fourth-graders, George and Harold, hypnotise their school principal Benjamin Krupp and convince him that he is Captain Underpants, a superhero. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Penguins Of Madagascar
programme.desc: Taking up from where the 2012 movie of the 'Madagascar' franchise left off, Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private find themselves in Italy, all set for a new adventure. Tom McGrath, Chris Miller, Conrad Vernon and Christopher Knights give their voices to the four delightful penguins who join forces with a spy organisation, The North Wind, and gear up to impede the evil Dr. Octavius Brine from exterminating the world. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: After Scrat's pursuit of an acorn sets off a series of asteroids to strike Earth, Manny, Sid, Diego and their herd must find a way to survive the impending doom. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Oh, a loveable misfit alien who is on the run from his own alien race, takes shelter on planet Earth and befriends Tip, an adventurous young girl who is on a quest to find her displaced mother Lucy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Iron Man 2
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo is offered the chance to cut short his prison tenure by going on a secret mission for the US government deep into the jungles of Vietnam and locating American POWs. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: Quinn McKenna, an army sniper, along with some fugitives and a scientist, sets out to kill the Predator and save Rory, his son, who was abducted as his autism reflects advancement in human evolution. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: After being diagnosed with terminal cancer, mercenary Wade Wilson undergoes a rogue experiment that tortures him and leaves him heavily disfigured. With a set of newly-acquired skills and accelerated healing abilities, he sets out to take down the man responsible. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Undisputed
programme.desc: An action movie that narrates the story of a heavyweight champion called George Iceman Chambers who lands in prison where the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champion. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Within These Walls
programme.desc: A single mother breaks up with her boyfriend and asks him to move out of their house when things do not work for her. However, she soon starts experiencing strange happenings in the house. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: A Taste Of Summer
programme.desc: Gabby, a sous chef from New York City, opens her own restaurant in Bright Shore, Massachusetts. Soon, she competes with Caleb, a fellow restaurateur, and bonds with him over time. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: In this action thriller, the dashing Keanu Reeves dons the role of 'John Wick', a hitman who follows the path of harmony upon falling in love with Helen. When she dies of an illness, she leaves behind a dog to help him come to grips with the situation. But when a bunch of men attack John and kill the puppy, he springs back into action and hunts down every man responsible for the act, including his former employer's son. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Skiptrace
programme.desc: Bennie Chan, a Hong Kong-based detective who is tasked with nabbing a powerful gangster, realises that the only way he can achieve his mission is if he takes the help of an American gambler, Connor Watts. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: When he is falsely framed in a CIA operation, Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin, in order to figure out why they are still after him. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Chahatein

programme.title: Yehh Jadu Hai Jinn Ka!

programme.title: Mann Kee Awaaz Pratigya

programme.title: Waqt
programme.desc: Waqt is the story of a father and a son between whom there is a special bond. Unlike many other father son relationships, these two are more like friends; the father being Ishwar Sharawat (Amitabh Bachchan) and his son Aditya (Akshay Kumar) Aditya is in love with Mitali (Priyanka Chopra) and after some initial problems the two get married to each other. Ishwar hopes that marriage will make Aditya a more responsible man but he is disappointed. One thing leads to another and Ishwar doesn't have an option but to throw Aditya out of the house. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Chup Chup Ke

programme.title: Golmaal Again
programme.desc: (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Jai Ho
programme.desc: Jai, an Indian military officer, is suspended from the Army because against the orders of the high command, he went ahead with a mission he believed in. He returns home and lives with his mother and sister. He soon realises that not many make an effort to help a needy. So he comes up with a unique concept to promote social responsibility among the apathetic civilians. In the process, he has to confront a potent political family. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
programme.desc: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Kick
programme.desc: Devi Lal Singh, a typical youth with an anomalous standard of living, tries to find pleasure in whatever he does. He continues to look for a kick in everything until he falls in love with Shaina. In the beginning, Shaina develops instant hatred towards Devi, but later falls in love with him and finds him a job, which he couldn't continue because of his attitude. He eventually becomes a thief and dons a new name, Devil. (Film - Action)

programme.title: C Kkompany

programme.title: Masaan

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: Thomas loses his memory and finds himself trapped in a massive maze called the Glade. He and his friends try to escape from the maze and eventually learn that they are subjects of an experiment. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ant-Man And The Wasp
programme.desc: With a few days left of his house arrest, Scott Lang dons the suit to help Hank and Hope 'the Wasp' Pym, who are on a risky quest to bring back Janet, Hope's mother, from the quantum realm while evading a powerful ghost-like being. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Captain Marvel
programme.desc: In 1995, Starforce member Vers and her team are sent to Earth in order to rescue an undercover operative infiltrating the Skrulls, the shapeshifters. During her mission, Vers gets separated from her team and is stranded on Earth. She meets S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent Nick Fury and with his help finds out that she had a life on Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend Of The Seven Seas
programme.desc: Superstar Brad Pitt lends his voice to the daredevil adventure-seeker from Middle East, Sinbad the Sailor, who is falsely accused of stealing a legendary magical Book of Peace. To make matters worse, malevolent goddess Eris puts forth a challenge giving Sinbad ten days to find the book or his childhood friend Prince Proteus will take the death penalty on his behalf. Sinbad and Proteus' fiancee Marina set out to face every obstacle that comes their way in order to save their dear Proteus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Starring action stalwarts Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger, the movie revolves around the exploits of a security system expert who is imprisoned in a high-tech prison and must figure out an ingenious way to escape. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the world has been ravaged by the dragons that were accidentally awakened from their slumber by humans. Now it is up to Quinn Abercromby (Christian Bale) and Denton Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey) to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: An alien race destroys major cities of the world with their advanced weaponry. However, a geek, a pilot, the US President and a group of ragtag survivors unite to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man with a bullet-ridden body is found and looked after by strangers. He wakes up to a blank memory and begins a journey to find out his identity. The road ahead is full of danger and conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: The Alpha Omega, a paramilitary faction, attacks Caesar's clan, killing his wife and the oldest son. Angered, Caeser rallies his army to take revenge from Colonel, the man behind the faction. Battling his own dark instincts, he decides to lead a final confrontation that will determine the future of the planet. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Hollywood action superstar Jason Statham essays the role of Frank Martin, a former Special Forces operator, who is hired by unknown clients to transport goods, human or otherwise, from one place to another. He is known to be the best in the business, as he transports anything without asking any questions and is always on time. However, complications arise when a job goes astray and he has to save the life of his female cargo. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Rock

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: MasterChef US
programme.desc: The Top Six travel to London, England, where they are divided into teams. To avoid elimination, the contestants must prepare an appetizer and an entree for 36 diners. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: Joanie becomes acquainted with EJ, an epigenetic scientist, while in Montauk for work. The two explore Joanie's family history, during which Joanie discovers the truth about her mother's death. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Empire
programme.desc: Cookie is threatened by Damon as Lucious's plans to escape the FBI reach a crisis and Andre cannot shake the ghosts of his past. Meanwhile, Tiana faces public backlash over a social media post. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Saviors's conflicts lead to unintended consequences for the Hilltop, the Kingdom, and Alexandria. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Recruit
programme.desc: James Clayton, a young and promising CIA recruit, is hired by Walter Burke, his senior instructor, to find a sleeper agent who has infiltrated the agency. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Goal! The Dream Begins
programme.desc: Santiago always had a dream of playing professional soccer but couldn't do much about it. He started following his father's footsteps and started supporting the family, until a life changing opportunity strikes him. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: An unmanned, half-mile-long freight train hurtles towards a town at breakneck speed. An engineer and a young conductor, who happen to be on the same route, must race against time to try and stop it. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: In the third instalment of the 'Johnny English' series, English, a retired M17 agent, currently working as a geography teacher, is entrusted with a secret mission. He teams up with his old aide Bough to investigate a cyber-attack that revealed the identity of Britain's intelligence agents. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Mercenaries William and Tovar are imprisoned in the Great Wall by a faction called the Nameless Order, which battles alien monsters that attack every sixty years. Once there, William ends up befriending Lin, a young commander, and decides to assist the Nameless Order in accomplishing their selfless mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: This animated 3D adventure film tells the story of the world's first family road trip where Grub, a caveman, treks to an unfamiliar world in search of a new home along with his family after their cave is destroyed in a natural disaster. Guy, a nomad, joins the family in their adventure and helps them cope up with the fear of the unknown. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Prince Of Persia: The Sands Of Time
programme.desc: With the help of a special, magical dagger that can help reverse time, a young prince and a princess must stop an evil villain whose actions threaten to destroy the world. (Film - Action)

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: Hiccup and Toothless find themselves in a new battle against a mysterious Dragon Rider, Drago. He wants to start a war using the dragons to rule the world. The two, along with their friends, must stand up and fight against Drago together if they want to change the future for both humans and dragons. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: When he is falsely framed in a CIA operation, Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin, in order to figure out why they are still after him. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: Tony Stark, an eccentric billionaire, philanthropist and also the Iron man, encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After almost losing everything in a battle with his enemy, Tony embarks on a journey with relentless consequences and a suit that ceases to exist. Will the Iron man overcome his failure and defeat his obdurate adversary. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: To prepare for the wedding, Whitney and Noah travel to Montauk. Later, Noah receives a concerning call from Petra, a reporter. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: Captain Stand, a firefighter from New York, moves to Austin, Texas, where he must help people and perform his duties diligently while trying to deal with his own problems. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Saviors's new weapon proves to be an obstacle for Rick as he continues fighting with them. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Kevin, a man with dissociative identity disorder, has 23 distinct personalities. He abducts three teenage girls and takes them to an underground facility. While the girls struggle to rescue themselves, they take advantage of some of the personalities of Kevin and discover the truth about the terrifying 24th personality, the Beast. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, the king of a town, enters a Christmas village and discovers a new idea of celebrating Halloween and Christmas together but fails miserably. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: Norah, a mechanical engineer, and her team must deal with an earthquake while they are working at the bottom of the Mariana Trench. While they try their best to get out of the ordeal, they discover that a few creatures belonging to an unidentified species are out to get them. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the distant future, a weary Logan provides for an ailing Professor X with the help of Caliban. His hideaway is exposed when he inadvertently becomes the protector of Laura, a young mutant on the run from a corporation and its hoodlums. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: After Scrat's pursuit of an acorn sets off a series of asteroids to strike Earth, Manny, Sid, Diego and their herd must find a way to survive the impending doom. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Oh, a loveable misfit alien who is on the run from his own alien race, takes shelter on planet Earth and befriends Tip, an adventurous young girl who is on a quest to find her displaced mother Lucy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: Remy, a rat, aspires to become a chef, oblivious to the fact that the profession is phobic to rodents. But the ambitious creature partners with garbage boy Linguini and the duo set a fine-dining restaurant in Paris ablaze with their culinary skills. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: The Monkey King decides to accompany Tang Sanzang, a monk, who aims to retrieve sacred scriptures. On their way, they encounter an evil demon who wants to harm Sanzang to seek immortality. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: A decade after his father's death in the Battle of the Breach, Jake Pentecost forfeits his Jaeger training and makes a living off the black market. But the rise of a new Kaiju threat finds him teaming up with his adoptive sister, Mako Mori, co-pilot Nate Lambert and 15-year-old Jaeger enthusiast Amara Namani to prevent a global catastrophe. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: Belle, a beautiful young woman, agrees to live with the Beast in exchange for the return of her abducted father. Soon, Belle discovers that her hideous captor is actually an enchanted prince. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Popular stars Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer and BD Wong lend their voices to recount a unique Chinese tale of a girl who takes an untrodden path of masquerading as a man just to save her land from the evil invaders. On gauging that her ailing father is in no position to defend his territory, 'Mulan' decides to take his place and lead her army to victory, but an unexpected company awaits her. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin who suffers from amnesia, sets out to track down a CIA official whilst trying to retain memories of a forgotten past. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Mike and Sulley, two monsters, join the Monsters University in order to graduate as the scariest monsters on the planet. While Mike is serious about his ambitions, his peer Sulley whiles away most of his time. A special programme Roar Omega Roar becomes the perfect opportunity for them to showcase their skills. But when they play mischief with Dean Abigail Hardscrabble, she forbids them from participation. Mike decides that he will participate in the Scare Games challenge and takes a vow to leave school in case he loses. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: In a faraway swamp, in solitude, lives the green ogre 'Shrek', brought to life by the iconic Mike Myers. His lonely existence is infested with fairytale characters, sent there by the evil Lord Farquaad, who wants him to rescue his beautiful bride-to-be, Princess Fiona (Cameron Diaz) and thus, he sets out with Donkey, voiced by the unmatchable Eddie Murphy, to wage a war against a fire-breathing dragon and rescue the princess. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: The third film in this animation franchise follows Lightning McQueen, who enlists the help of race technician Cruz Ramirez to get back in the racing game after the rise of a younger, faster generation of racers. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: The actions of Thanos leave the universe in ruins with exactly half of all life disintegrated. The Avengers, however, refuse to give up and assemble again to try and bring back all the people that were lost, ready to do whatever it takes to undo the chaos caused by the Mad Titan. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: In the wake of a calamity of epic proportions, Manny is separated from Ellie and Peached and is left with Diego, Sid and his grandmother on an iceberg. As they attempt to return to his family, the motley friends are apprehended by pirates. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: On a special CIA mission, Dutch and his team of commandos must save themselves from an extra-terrestrial warrior deep in the Central American jungle. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A possible assassination of the Chinese premier and a conspiracy involving the MI-7, KGB and the CIA force the bosses at MI-7 to recall their brave but unconventional agent, Johnny English, who after a failed mission is seeking a shot at redemption. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: Andy's favourite toy, Woody, is worried that after Andy receives his birthday gift, a new toy called Buzz Lightyear, his importance may get reduced. He thus hatches a plan to eliminate Buzz. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: Keeping with his famous trend of aestheticizing violence, Quentin Tarantino brings a war film starring Brad Pitt, Christoph Waltz and Melanie Laurent. Set in the backdrop of World War II, 'Inglourious Basterds' traverses the scheming and plotting of two groups that aim to assassinate prominent Nazi political leaders. But a single night changes the fate of everyone involved when the two groups cross each other's paths. (Film - War)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: As Noah's expose comes out and he is accused by six women of problematic behaviour, Whitney and Helen must decide where their allegiances lie. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: The team tries to save a man trapped within a grain silo and TK fights Judd. Further, Michelle disregards a restraining order to confront someone while Owen grapples with cancer. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and his group have an argument, which leads to the consequences of choosing between life and death. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Popular stars Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer and BD Wong lend their voices to recount a unique Chinese tale of a girl who takes an untrodden path of masquerading as a man just to save her land from the evil invaders. On gauging that her ailing father is in no position to defend his territory, 'Mulan' decides to take his place and lead her army to victory, but an unexpected company awaits her. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: Dusty, a cropduster dreams of becoming a great air racer. Along with his friend, Chug, a fuel truck, Dusty practises flying manoeuvres, in order to qualify for the Wings Across the World race. A night before the qualifiers, Dusty asks Skipper, an old navy war plane, for assistance. Skipper refuses to help Dusty. The next day at the race, Dusty is laughed upon by the audience but manages to wow them with his smooth flying. He just manages to qualify for the main race. It is then that Skipper asks Dusty the reason he wants to participate in the race and satisfied with his answer, he decides to help Dusty. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Night At The Museum: Secret Of The Tomb
programme.desc: The endearing museum security guard Larry Daley discovers that the Tablet of Ahkmenrah is corroding and the exhibits will not be able to come to life at night. After learning that the secret to restoring it lies with Ahkmenrah's parents, he sets out on a wild adventure across the globe to save the museum's precious inhabitants. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: After being fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru sets out to meet his long-lost twin, Dru, for the first time. But he is soon forced to team up with his brother to take down Balthazar Bratt, a former child star, whose obsession with his 80s character turns him into a supervillain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim is envious of his baby brother. But his animosity towards him doesn't last long when he learns that this baby, who calls himself The Boss, can talk and behave like an adult and is on a mission to stop Puppy Co from replacing the love for babies with puppies. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: Quinn McKenna, an army sniper, along with some fugitives and a scientist, sets out to kill the Predator and save Rory, his son, who was abducted as his autism reflects advancement in human evolution. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: War veteran Will Sawyer is entrusted with the task of assessing the security of a high-profile building in China. He gets framed when aides of an international terrorist hack into the security system of the building. Sawyer then struggles to prove his innocence and save his family trapped in the fire. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: Princess Giselle is banished from her kingdom by her lover's evil stepmother. She is then transported to the real world where she meets a lawyer and finds herself falling for him. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Based on a story written by Hollywood's renowned Adam Horowitz, Walt Disney Pictures releases 'Tron: Legacy', a sequel to the 1982 cult film 'Tron', which created a buzz among video game geeks as well as movie buffs, that depicts the adventurous journey of Sam, son of a video game developer who mysteriously disappeared 20 years ago, as he is sucked into a virtual reality called the Grid, created by his father, with a mission to stop a corrupted programme from invading the human world. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: A Brush With Love
programme.desc: Jamie Spellman, the owner of an art school and a struggling painter, makes a painting for a competition. Later, she tries to find someone in her life who resembles the man in her painting. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)
